item.description:
This looks like an interesting show. They'll have the Terrafugia there as well as lots of LSA's. I'd like to go here and do the Wings and Wheels show in Conn. Hey, why not??

See Their Awesome Flyer Attached...

Free event.
Look for our tent to the right of the main terminal.
$75.00/passenger (2 pass min/4 max) Bi-plane Rides
Rain date: Sun – Sept 20 – check www.EAA106.org ‘News Flash’ for info

Flight Design CTLS
The Transition By Terrafugia
American Legend Cub
Remos


The Transition By Terrafugia. It’s not a “Flying Car”,it’s a … “Roadable Aircraft”


Lawrence Municipal Airport,
492 Sutton St., No. Andover, MA
http://tinyurl.com/3o...
